column2: Using technical analysis of the charts of those stocks, and, when appropriate, recent actions and grades from TheStreet's Quant Ratings, we zero in on five names. While we will not be weighing in with fundamental analysis, we hope this piece will give investors interested in stocks on the way down a good starting point to do further homework on the names. Wolfspeed Inc. recently was downgraded to Sell with a D+ rating by TheStreet's Quant Ratings.
column4: [video]Bearish Bets: 2 Tech Stocks You Should Consider Shorting This Week
